      • useExecutionPeriod

        public Controve.Configurator useExecutionPeriod(long interval,
                                                java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
        Configure Controve to use the specified interval in the specified time unit for its system metronome.
        Parameters:
        interval - the interval for the system to loop on
        unit - the time unit of the interval
        Returns:
        this configurator for method chaining

      • reportExcessiveExecutionPeriods

        public Controve.Configurator reportExcessiveExecutionPeriods(java.util.function.LongConsumer handler)
        Configure a handler to monitor excessive execution periods.

        This handler will be called every time the Conductor takes longer than the execution period to execute each interval.

        Parameters:
        handler - the handler of excessive execution times
        Returns:
        this configurator for method chaining
